About

Hello, I'm currently a senior at California State Polytechnic University, Pomona. I'm pursuing a bachelor degree in computer science, and I'm expecting to graduate in December 2018.

I'm also a software developer co-op at Metropolitan Water District of Southern California (MWD).
I started this position in June 2017. My main responsibity at MWD is to develop desktop applications to use internally.
Specifically, I develop applications to help generating reports, query and visualize data, use data to show charts and trends
Users of my applications are mainly Water Quality Assurance Officer, Water Sample Collectors, Engineering Team, Operation Compliance Team.
Please see my portfolio for some of the projects that I did at MWD.

Previously, I was a tutor at Mt. San Antonio College. I worked there from Feb 2016 to Jun 2017. The subjects that I tutor were Computer Science, Math and Physics.
I provided instructions to individuals or small groups of students to prepare for academic tests, improve academic performance and skills.

Contact Me

Distribution System

Distribution System is an internal desktop application written in C#, .NET and Oracle SQL. It is used at Metropolitan Water District to generate reports such as Daily Chlorine, Weekly Temperature & pH or Weekly Ammonia Nitrite maps. These reports will be sent out to member agencies through out Southern California.

Close Project

Warehouse Query

Warehouse Query is a desktop application used at Metropolitan Water District of Southern California. It is written in C#, .Net and Oracle SQL. The application allows users to query data from different data sources at MWD, save queries as well as customize data fields to be displayed and many more other features.

Close Project

Sunshine

Sunshine is an Android mobile applicaition written in Java and uses OpenWeatherMap API to retrieve data.

Close Project View on Github

Pixel Art Maker

Pixel Art Maker is a front-end web project that allows users to create their beautiful art work by creating a canvas and draw differnt colors on it. This project uses Javascript, jQuery, DOM, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap

Close Project View on Github

Handwrtting Regconition

This machine learning project creates a covolutional neural network to learn to recognize handwritten digits. Data used for training is from mnist data set. The project uses Keras, Tensorflow and other libraries. View on github for more details

Close Project View on Github

Virtual Memory Simulator

Virtual Memory Simulator is a Java console project which simulates how a virtual memory works. View github for more details

Close Project View on Github
